name: Meteor Shower (itch) (Samrat)
description:
Meteor Shower is an action, endless driving game developed by Samrat Luitel.  The player controls a car in meteor falling world and is supposed to avoid the meteorite explosion while not being crashed into any other earthy obstacles.  

JUST ONE RULE!!! AVOID THE METEOR

Minimum requirement:-

  • RAM :-2GB
  • Processor:- Intel core 3 or equivalent
  • HDD: 100MB
  • VIdeo Card:- GeForce 4 , ATI Radeon 8500 ,Intel HD (any)
  • OS:- Windows 10/Windows 8/Windows 7

Standard requirement:-

  • RAM:-4GB
  • Processor:-Intel core 5 or equivalent
  • HDD: -100MB
  • Video Card: Intel HD 520,AMD Radeon R5 M335

Note:- If your game does not meet standard requirement( I repeat STANDARD REQUIREMENTS), play the game on night mode. To select night mode turn off the directional light which will be prompted in the first time

Bug Alert: Despite this game  encourages any kind of criticisim, there are some bugs which are still not fixed. And one of them is asteroid hits you the first time you play the game(this will not happen on replaying). Please, forgive me for this.

Installation

  1. Download the Meteor Shower.zip
  2. Unzip with winrar or similar software
  3. Run Meteor Shower.exe
  4. Enjoy!!!
